column4: Westpac commodity finance division expects revenue growth this year
column5: HONG KONG  June 15 The structured commodity finance division of Australia's Westpac bank expects revenues to grow by a third this financial year as new products gain momentum  but business is likely to level out next year as the global economy falters.
